data.event: Nina Webb-Lawton, Dublin Arts Council board member and member of the DAC Community Arts Grants Committee, announced Monday, March 23 that the DAC is awarding 2009 community arts grants totaling $13,440 to three local groups, DAC Marketing and Public Relations Manager Janet Cooper said.

event.title: will take place at 8 p.m. May 1 and 2

data.event: The group's spring concert, "The Times of Our Lives" will take place at 8 p.m. May 1 and 2, and 3 p.m. May 3 in the Abbey Theater at the Dublin Community Recreation Center, 5600 Post Road, according to information from the group's Web site.

event.title: directed by Linda Sopp, at 8 p.m. April 24 and 25

data.event: "The troupe will perform Cliffhanger, written by James Yaffe and directed by Linda Sopp, at 8 p.m. April 24 and 25, May 1 and 2 and May 7, 8 and 9 at the theater in the Dublin Village Shopping Center at 6799 Dublin Center Drive.
A 2 p.m. performance will take place May 3, according to information from the troupe.
